response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $15,000. Considering this, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 12000}
